title: President condoles martyrdom of 10 FC personnel in DI Khan terror attack
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 25 (APP): President Asif Ali Zardari on Friday expressed condolence over the martyrdom of 10 FC personnel in a terrorist attack took place in Dera Ismail Khan.
The president strongly condemned the terror attack and paid tribute to the FC personnel who embraced martyrdom, according to a President House press release.
Lauding the patriotism of the martyred soldiers, President Zardari conveyed his condolence to the bereaved families.
He prayed to Allah Almighty for elevation of the martyrsâ€™ ranks in paradise and for strength for their families to bear the loss.
